name: Wizard and the Pug: Princess Rescue
name_original: Wizard and the Pug: Princess Rescue
description:
The theme was "Standing on the Shoulders of Giants".

You play as a pug riding wizard, who is on a mission to save the princess from the evil king. You need to fight off the guards and blow up the castle gates, where she is being kept prisoner. The pug gets angry sometimes and transforms into a giant devil dog.

This is an old project reuploaded to itch.io to have all my game jam games conveniently in one place. There are no plans to continue development.
